Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Extends the authorization for Ontario county to impose additional rates of sales and compensating use tax
Summary: Extends the authorization for Ontario county to impose additional rates of sales and compensating use tax for two years from November 30, 2020 until November 30, 2022.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to extending the authorization for Ontario county to impose additional rates of sales and compensating use tax
